Storage

Metadata DB

storage.metadata_db.db.get_connection()[source]

Returns a SQLite connection and ensures foreign keys are enabled.

Return type:

Connection

storage.metadata_db.db.init_db()[source]

Initializes required tables if they do not exist. Safe to call multiple times.

Return type:

None

storage.metadata_db.db.execute(query, params=())[source]

Executes a query with the provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • query (str)

  • params (tuple)

Return type:

None

storage.metadata_db.db.fetch_one(query, params=())[source]

Fetches a single row from the database for the given query and parameters.

Parameters:

  • query (str)

  • params (tuple)

storage.metadata_db.db.fetch_all(query, params=())[source]

Fetches all rows from the database for the given query and parameters.

Parameters:

  • query (str)

  • params (tuple)

Return type:

list

storage.metadata_db.db.log_active_schema()[source]

Logs current database schema using the project logger.

Return type:

None

storage.metadata_db.db.get_document(document_id)[source]

Retrieves a document by its ID.

Parameters:

document_id (str)

Return type:

Iterator[Row]
